{{Wireless embedded system |brand=IGNITION Design Labs |model=Portal |revision=(SAP001) |fcc_date=12/08/2015 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, mesh hub |fcc_id=2AFZUSAP001 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A; |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSQ |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG6SB-25 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Wistron NeWeb DAXA-51 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201F |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2565T;SiGe, 2565T, 528CF;3; |flags=MU-MIMO, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|IgnitionHub Portal}} :Marketing Name: IgnitionHub
This is likely a prototype for [[IGNITION Design Labs Portal]] though the device :in the FCC photos looks different from this other possible prototype. There is a daughter board inside the case connected via ethernet.
*[https://www.tomsguide.com/us/portal-router-specs-price,news-21966.html ''IDL Portal'' on '''TomsGuide'''] *[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M5HqaTEVyH4 On '''YouTube''']
